Suddenly the statue began to crack as Cream quickly backed away with Cheese hiding behind her in fear. As the pieces of stone shattered Cream was looking away to shield her eyes from the dust that was forming.

As the dust finally cleared Cream opened her eyes which immediately went wide open in shock as she saw standing before her was the same troll, only not stoned anymore.

The troll looked around in confusion, and then at his finger. "I'm free? Ha Ha! I'M FREE!" the troll shouted in triumph.

Sonic tried to run place, but it was just regular, normal, unimpressive run. Sonic super speed was gone...

Winthrop chuckled out loud in triumph as he taunted, "How does it feel to be a normal hedgehog?"

"What did you do to me?!" Sonic asked his temper starting to rise.

"I promised myself you be the first I used my ring on, and thanks to this emerald. I just made you into a normal, unimpressive, nonlethal hedgehog," Winthrop taunted back.

Sonic started to charge at Winthrop with his fist out. "I may not be the fastest thing alive anymore, but I'm still tough enough to knock you down!" he shouted.

"We'll see about that. I'm still not done having fun with you," Winthrop said as he aimed his glowing ring at the charging hedgehog as he...
12111112111221.title: A Regular Blue Hedgehog

1211111211122111.content:
Sonic was charging until he stopped dead in his tracks as he felt a strange tingly sensation throughout his body. He groaned as he threw his arms around his stomach as he felt it start to gurgle. He was starting to feel... bloated.

Suddenly Sonic felt like his entire body exploded as every part of him quickly expanded. His belly filled with blob fat which materialized out of nowhere as he grew moobs that would put Rouge to shame. His arms and legs bloated and sagged. His face bulged as his cheeks puffed up with fat. His mouth become almost squished by the increase of chin flab he gained. And his butt bulged and grew along with him. All within a split second Sonic was now a 20ft tall ball of blob and fat that took up half the room. Thankfully Tails workshop was a large area otherwise Sonic would be in a tighter situation.

Sonic let out a groan and huffed as he tried to pull together what just happened. He tried to stand up but couldn't manage. As he strained and groaned at himself to stand up, he accidentally banged his head on something. Looking at it he saw he hit a hanging light bulb. Looking up further and saw he was only a few inches from the ceiling. It was only when he looked down did Sonic finally see what he had become; leaving his mouth completely agape

While this was going on, Winthrop was rolling on the floor laughing his head off. Tails just sat in his chair still in a daze. Winthrop pulled himself together so that he could examine the new Sonic.

"Who's the chubby one now hedgeblob?!" Winthrop taunted as he patted Sonic's big belly.

Sonic didn't respond, he was still in shock over what had happened. Sonic's been through a lot of the unbelievable in past. But this? This was just plain unreal! He made Eggman look like mouse. Forget that! He made a elephant look like a twig! For the first time ever, Sonic was unsure of himself.

Down below Winthrop was still admiring his work as he walked around the enlarged Sonic until he was behind him, facing his humongous rear. "I guess I'll have to let Cream know to give your food to me. I don't think your keister needs the pounds," he said as he slapped Sonic in his huge jello bum.

Sonic's eyes widened in shock. Not over having his butt slapped mind you, that was part of it. No he alarmed over a new revelulation.

Cream, Tails. They were helpless. Sonic knew he had to do something. He may be a immobile, enlarged blue hedgehog, but he was still Sonic the Hedgehog!

Sonic turned his head to look behind him. It wasn't easy through the folds of his fat, but Winthrop was definitely behind him. Turning back to look at his new self, Sonic got an idea.

Straining himself Sonic started to swing himself back and forth until he managed to finally fall on his back in a body slam of fat, crushing Winthrop under it.

Right...?
1211111211122111.title: The Fattest Thing Alive

choices: Continue to test the ring, how?
12111112111221111.content:
As Sonic laid there on the floor, he tried to look himself over again. It wasn't much to see for his enlarged belly blocked his view of everything, and his engorged cheeks make things even more difficult. He just dropped his head on the floor staring up at the ceiling as he wondered what was he to do now? He was still... well not himself. Not to forget his speed was gone as well. Maybe when Cream finally comes in he can get her to wake Tails and he can do something to fix him. Until then all the pudgy hedgehog could do was lie there staring up at the ceiling.

Suddenly the light got darker over Sonic. Giving a confused expression, Sonic wondered why it got a little dark over him? But that's when he realized it was a shadow.

A little man's shadow.

Winthrop appeared looming over Sonic's head with a evil grin. "Nice... try." Winthrop said as he flicked Sonic's nose.

Sonic turned his head in Winthrop's direction as they were now face to face. "Might I also say that if you had falling on me giving your... Ahem! Given weight... Little old me would have been crushed! And we don't want that, do we?" Winthrop spoke as he pinched Sonic's chubby cheek.

Sonic groaned as he tried to pull himself up off the floor, but he was just too heavy and fell right onto the floor. He was really stuck now. He couldn't move, there's was nothing he could do. He was at Winthrop's mercy. Maybe it was the body fat, or from his attempt at a sit up. But Sonic felt a drop of sweat go down his forehead. There was no denying it. Sonic was nervous. For the first time ever Sonic was nervous. In the past maybe he was worried for a friend, but never himself.

Winthrop also saw the drop of sweat. It brought him joy to know he was able to bring a great hero to his knees... or back. He chuckled to himself as he walked a few steps away from Sonic. Confused by what he was doing Sonic continued to eye Winthrop. Winthrop aimed his ring at as his Sonic entire body glowed green. He was then lifted up dropped right on his butt so that he was now back in seated upright position.

Sonic was now really nervous. A little scared if you might. He must weigh as much as a truck! And Winthrop's ring just picked him up like he was a paper! Right now only one thing came to mind. Calling for help.

Sonic didn't like to use his friends to fight his battles but this was clearly a situation that would affect them as well. Tails was out of it so that only left Cream. He didn't want to put her in danger but maybe if he told her to get help as he called for her, she or Cheese could get away. His mind was made up. Sonic opened his mouth as he called, "Crea-"

Before he could finish, a green light surrounded his mouth, snapping it shut. He couldn't talk. He couldn't get help. Sonic looked down and saw Winthrop with a huge grin on his face and his ring up and aimed at Sonic. "Once again, nice try," he plainly spoke.

Sonic's eyes were now wide in horror. That was it. There was nothing he could do.

"Some hero you are. Asking a little girl to come to your aid? And you were willing to put her in the danger? Tsk tsk hedgehog."

Sonic's head lowered in shame. For once Winthrop was right. Sonic had a moment of weakness, and tried to put a little girl he cared for in harms way.

"So, for your insolence of trying to do harm onto me, and almost putting my new friend in harms way." Sonic gave Winthrop a angry glare. He's no friend of Cream, he's just using her! Sonic could only hope she would figure it out soon enough. "You'll have the honor of testing my ring even further. I wanna know what else its capable of until I get to meet your other friends..." Winthrop said with a evil tone, with that last statement sending a shiver done Sonic's chubby back.
12111112111221111.title: At The Mercy Of A Troll

choices: Changes Sonic's form again. But into what?
121111121112211111.title: Continue to test the ring, how?

choices: Continue to have fun with Sonica
12111112111221111111.content:
Winthrop knew what to try. He damaged Sonic's spirit with the add on weight, he grinned at the idea of what this would do to him. But before he did that, he wanted to give the hedgehog some false hope. That would add bonus points to the damage.

"Hey, hedgeblob," Winthrop spoke. Sonic looked down at Winthrop's direction with a angered look. "I'll tell you what, you can either stay like that for rest of the time, or I can change your form into something... that takes up less room if you can do one small thing for me."

Sonic shook his head vigorously up and down to him. Anything was better then this!

Winthrop ring glowed as Sonic was flung to the ground smashing his face and stomach onto the floor. Rubbing his nose he looked angrily at Winthrop.

"Now, all you have to do is give me one push up. It should be easy for so called hero such as yourself. Just one push up, and I'll change you."

One push up? Before Sonic could have done fifty with one arm behind his back. But now...

He extended his hands to the ground and groaned as he tried to perform a simple push up. He was dripping sweat as his body jiggled from trying. Finally he pushed up in a split second as he dropped back down to ground panting and sweating.

Winthrop chuckled with a grin as his ring glowed once again as Sonic felt that strange sensation throughout his body again as the fat and weight dissolved from his body. Sonic was soon back to his old figure and lying on the floor panting and covered in sweat. When he looked up Winthrop was standing above him with his ring aimed at him still glowing.

Confused Sonic began, "But you said-"

Winthrop interrupted,"Are you new to this whole sneaky villain thing? I said I change you into something that took less space, and I meant it."

Sonic closed his eyes as a different feeling went throughout his body. He felt his hips widen, his body change, hair grow on his forehead. When Sonic opened his eyes he spoke, "What did you-" Sonic closed his mouth realizing his voice sounded different. Sonic looked down at a puddle of oil that was there on the floor and saw what Winthrop did to him. He was a girl! With eyelashes and long puff of hair forming over his head. She looked away in horror as she looked at herself, another thing came to mind. She was a girl who was naked! She grabbed a dirty rag from nearby to cover herself up as she saw Winthrop yucking it up over the ordeal. When he was done he saw the female Sonic staring at him in anger.

"Oh I'm sorry me lady. You must be shivering without the proper attire Sonica. Here...," Winthrop spoke as his ring shot at the rag turning it into red shorts, and a white sleeveless shirt that formed onto her body, showing off her curves. Sonica then started walking over to Winthrop with fire burning in her eyes.

Winthrop taking notice of this quickly thought to himself that maybe making him into girl may have freaked him out some more, but she was now mobile and heading towards him. Before Sonica was about to grab him Winthrop shot her with his ring as her body went into a exotic dance. She swong her hips from side to side as she twirled around the lab. Sonica still in control of her head tried to regain control of her body as she shook her head vigorously, but there was nothing she could but continue to do her belly dance for Winthrop.

Winthrop clapped his hands for the dancing hedgehog until her dance was finished as she dropped to the ground panting.Winthrop decided that perhaps having Sonic brain inside Sonica wasn't the best idea. He walked over to Sonica with a grin on his face as his ring glowed in her face causing Sonica to go into a quick daze before shaking it off and grabbing her aching head.

"What happened," she asked. Looking around she eyed a half broken mirror with her reflection in it. She walked over to it and smiled seductively. "Hey good looking," she said as she posed herself and made kissy faces at the mirror.

Winthrop just watched in the back and laughed. The change was complete Sonic was gone, and Sonica was in control now. He was liking Sonica more then Sonic already.
12111112111221111111.title: Feminine Hedgehog

121111121112211111112.content: Winthrop's laughter subsided when he herd humming coming from the other room and growing louder. Cream was coming back! Winthrop began to sweat with nervousness. What was he to do? He still wanted to use Cream to toy with her other friends. But what of Sonic, or Sonica? He looked over and Sonica was still eying herself in the mirror. What was he to do? Change him back? That was no fun. Lie or subdue Cream? What should he do?
121111121112211111112.title: What now?

choices: Put her somewhere else for use later
1211111211122111111121.title: What to do with Sonica (Sonic)?

121111121112211111112111.content: Looking at his ring, Winthrop got a idea. Pointing it out the unaware Hedgehog, she glowed a bright green then was materialized into the ring. Winthrop would keep Sonica there for use another time. But what about Tails? Should Winthrop use the ring on him too?
121111121112211111112111.title: Another place, another time

1211111211122111111121112.content:
Winthrop couldn't do anything to Tails. With Sonic not here he needed somebody to be around so that Cream doesn't get suspicious. Looking over at Tails, Winthrop saw he was still sitting there at his desk with a blank look on his face.

Thinking hard Winthrop noticed the vase of flowers on the desk that Sonic put there and got a idea. He walked over to Tails and adjusted him so that he was facing the vase like he was examining them up close.
1211111211122111111121112.title: Improvise

12111112111221111111211121.content:
As Cream finally entered holding a trey of sandwiches she saw... Tails sitting in his chair staring at the vase of flowers, and Winthrop leaning by his desk whistling a tune to himself looking up at the ceiling nonchalantly. He stopped when he saw her come in.

"Is that food," he asked. Cream replied, "Yes, they're cheese sandwiches."

Within a split second Winthrop grabbed two and starting chugging them down. "Thanks with what I've been through I could use some food," he spoke grinning to himself. Cream just smiled for the hungry Troll until she noticed something. "Where's Mr.Sonic," She asked.

In a place where he... or should I say "she" will stay until I find another use for her. Winthrop said in his mind. He swallowed the food in his mouth and quickly made up a lie. "He left after he dropped off the the vase. He must have decided to go for a run."

"Oh. He usually says goodbye," Cream said slightly hurt. Winthrop quickly replied, "Oh! And he wanted me to tell you goodbye and he loves the flowers."

"Oh," Cream said her happy expression returning. She then saw that Tails hadn't said anything and started walking over to him. Winthrop quickly stopped her and spoke, "I wouldn't do that."

"Why not?" Cream asked. Thinking up another lie Winthrop said, "Tails is examining your flowers. He wants to study them. He is deep in thought and can't be disturbed."

"...Oh. Well I'm glad he likes them," she replied. "Just don't go and experiment on them Tails they're very lovely and I like them to stay that way."

Winthrop just smiled to himself as he left the room to the kitchen. This was too easy, even for him. He then saw Cream walk in and say, "I've left him some food in case he gets hungry, as for the rest I'll bring to the others as we bring to them the other flowers. You ready to go Winthrop?"

Winthrop just grinned and spoke, "Lead on."

Next stop...
12111112111221111111211121.title: Fun's over... For now...

121111121112211111112111211.content:
To get to where Shadow lived Cream and Winthrop had to walk into the city. Shadow owned a small apartment by Club Rouge. Shadow liked to keep to himself and didn't even want the apartment in the first place, but Rouge insisted on it so that it be easier for her and they're friends to find him easier if need be. Other then Rouge and Sonic from time to time, not many people visited Shadow. Which is why Cream was gonna deliver some fresh flowers in hopes of brightening his day. Not too many people were out on the streets and those who were, had they're attention focused on there own matters, so nobody noticed a little rabbit walk by with a choa and a troll.

Cream and Winthrop made it to Shadows apartment as Cream knocked on a door. After a short delay the door opened revealing a black hedgehog with a blank emotionless expression on his face. "Cream," he spoke in a empty tone as a greeting. "Cheese," he said to Cheese in a empty tone as a greet again. "Whoever you are," he said in the same way to Winthrop. Winthrop just shrugged at him.

"Hello Mr. Shadow. Its good to see you," Cream happily spoke shaking Shadows hand. Shadow let go and asked, "What brings you hear?"

"I just came hear to see you, and give you these," Cream said showing the bouquet of flowers, and nudged Winthrop to show the bag of sandwiches she made him carry. "Can we come in," Cream asked politely.

Shadow turned his attention to Winthrop giving him a glare. Winthrop just glared back. After a short delay Shadow responded, "Fine..."

Shadow lead them to...
121111121112211111112111211.title: The Ultimate Lifeform

1211111211122111111121112111.content:
Shadow lead them into the kitchen as Cream had Winthrop place the sandwiches on the nearby table. She then asked, "Mr. Shadow? Do you have something I can put these flowers in?"

Shadow leaned against the wall as he spoke, "You can check the closet in the my room, just don't touch anything," he finished sternly.

Cream replied as she and Cheese walked out, "Don't worry I won't. You two just stay here and relax."

When Cream left there was a awkward pause in the kitchen. Winthrop stood by the table examining Shadow, while Shadow just continued to lean against the wall staring at Winthrop.

Breaking the silence Winthrop spoke, "Not very chatty are you?" Shadow just turned his head in another direction, giving Winthrop the sign that he was not interested in chatting. The room then went silent again.

Okay that's it, this is the most boring character I've met! Cream told me Shadow was some powerful being who rivaled that of Sonic... Tails was more interesting then this guy! Time for to shake things up!
1211111211122111111121112111.title: Kitchen

1211111211122111111121112111112.content:
Winthrop smiled to himself as he thought up a idea. He examined Shadow again and said, "You seem well in shape Shadow."

Shadow examined himself then turned his head back at Winthrop and spoke, "Thanks, I guess."

Winthrop looked at the sandwiches on the table and then back at Shadow and spoke, "Why don't you have some?" referring to the sandwiches. Shadow just turned his head in another direction ignoring Winthrop again.

"I wasn't asking," Winthrop said as his ring glowed as Shadow was shot by its gaze. When it stopped, Shadow was on his knees rubbing his head wondering what happened. But then he felt a gurgle in his stomach, and then a urge swept through him. A powerful urge Shadow had never felt before... A urge to eat. Next thing he or Winthrop knew, Shadow was right front of the table scarfing down sandwiches like there was no tomorrow.

Winthrop just laughed at the whole fiasco. Within a minute the sandwiches were gone, and Shadow was leaning on the table breathing heavily, due too the overeating and how fast he ate them. "Still hungry? Well what about your white box?" he said pointing at the fridge. Next thing he knew Shadow was right in front of the fridge scarfing down any source of food he could find. While this was going on Winthrop just laughed himself silly as he noticed a bulge in Shadow's belly, he wouldn't be in shape for long.

What now?
1211111211122111111121112111112.title: The Ultimate Blob

12111112111221111111211121111122111.content:
Winthrop grinned to himself at the idea as he ring glowed. Sonica gasped as her eyes glowed green. She then looked toward the hedgehog gorging himself in the fridge. Eyes were then replaced with hearts as she sprinted over to him. She adjusted her hair and placed her hands on her hips in a sexy pose saying, "Hey good looking, where have you been all my life?"

Shadow just ignored her and continued eating. Sonica frowned in a mopey fashion. Noticing this, Winthrop walked over to offer her some advice.

He spanked her on the rear to get her full attention as he spoke, "You wanna know a way to get him to like you?" Quickly responding she shook her head vigorously up and down, "Yes! Yes! Yes!"

Winthrop grinned and said, "Well what I recommend is..."
12111112111221111111211121111122111.title: Shadow

121111121112211111112111211111221111.content:
Looking back over at the fridge. It was clear that Shadow wasn't gonna be able to fit in the fridge for much longer, let alone take food out of it. Falling right on his fat rear, Shadow strained as he tried to get up and to the fridge. Taking this as the right moment Sonica walked over and said, "Need some help hansom?"

Shadow while panting just shook his head slowly indicating a yes. She went and pulled something out of the fridge and presented it to Shadow as he ate it. "More..." was all he said. Sonica happily obliged as she continued to feed Shadow, giving a thumbs up to Winthrop, who gave her a thumbs up back.
121111121112211111112111211111221111.title: Feeding Him

1211111211122111111121112111112211112.content:
Hearing the familiar sound of Cream humming Winthrop quickly exited the kitchen to meet Cream in the living room with Cheese holding a old vase with flowers in it. "Hello Winthrop, are you and Mr.Shadow doing okay," she asked sweetly. "Oh... we're doing okay. But he said he wants us to leave."

Cream's smile turned upside down as she asked, "Why?" Thinking quickly he said, "Because he's having someone over, and he said he would like to be alone with them."

"Like a date?" Winthrop quickly responded, "Yeah... Yeah that's it he's in there with a girl! They're in there right now eating those sandwiches you made. He says you're a real chef." Cream's smile returned again as she giggled saying, "Well I learned from my mom." Cream then thought carefully. "Hmm... I wouldn't want to disturb Mr.Shadow's date. I'll just leave these flowers on the coffee table and we'll go," she said placing them on said table. The trio then left the building and headed to...
1211111211122111111121112111112211112.title: Time to go

12111112111221111111211121111122111121.content:
The three left the city and headed out back into the forest. Within a half-hour they arrived at Amy's house. It was a small one story house, but a nice quiet place to live, not to far from the city, but far enough from the lights and noise.

Cream knocked on the door, and within a few seconds a pink hedgehog answered who's face beamed with a smile, which grew when she realized who was at her door. "Cream," she shouted in joy as she and Cream embraced each other in a large hug. When they let go she asked, "How ya been?" Cream responded, "I've been well Amy, and I brought you something."

Cream pointed at a disgruntled Winthrop who was holding a bouquet of flowers. (He's not too happy to be holding the flowers) Amy with a her beaming smile now gone asked, "Who is this?"

"This is my new friend Winthrop," Cream happily said as she was took the flowers out his his hands. "Winthrop, this is my good friend Amy." Amy awkwardly waved at him with a nervous smile. Winthrop with a neutral look just gave a small wave at her.

"Um... Would you like to come in," She asked. Cream nodded and entered with Cheese and Winthrop following. Along the way in Winthrop was thinking, Come on! How many hedgehogs does this kid know?!

"You came at a good time, I was having some friends over," Amy said as she closed the door. Now we're talking! Winthrop shouted in his head.

"Who's here," Cream asked. "Well come see for yourself," Amy answered as she lead them into the living room.

How many guests does Amy have over?
12111112111221111111211121111122111121.title: Amy Rose

121111121112211111112111211111221111211.content: Who does Amy have over?
121111121112211111112111211111221111211.title: Two but who?

1211111211122111111121112111112211112111.title: Rouge and...

choices: Amy and the others are suspicious of Cream's new friend
Amy and the others try and be friendly to Cream's new friend
1211111211122111111121112111112211112111.content:
When they entered the living room they found Blaze the cat sitting on the left side of a couch with a straight posture, and her hands on her lap. On the right side of the couch was Rouge the bat sitting with hands behind her head and her legs resting on the coffee table. When Blaze noticed them enter she remarked, "Cream!"

Cream ran over and hugged Blaze remarking, "Blaze!" Rouge sat back in normal position asking, "How ya been kid?"

"I've been well. Thank you Ms.Rouge," Cream responded after hugging Blaze. Rouge just smiled back until she noticed the extra guest in the room. "Who's this?"

Amy awkwardly replied, "This is Cream's new friend, Winthrop." Like before Winthrop just gave a shallow wave, although while in his mind he was drooling at the idea of a house full a lady's to mess with.

So what do the girls think of Winthrop?
1211111211122111111121112111112211112111.title: A Bat, a Cat, a Hedgehog, a Rabbit, and a Troll

1211111211122111111121112111112211112111.content:
As Winthrop walked around examining the room, Cream followed with to show him a photo album Amy had. While this was going on Rouge whispered Amy and Blaze to follow her into the kitchen. When they were sure they were alone Rouge began, "Okay, does anybody find something odd about Cream's new friend?"

"Yeah, he gave me shivers," Blaze replied. "Didn't that kid's mother teach not to go with strangers," Rouge asked. "It's not her fault, Cream is just very trusting," Amy answered.

"Amy did Cream say anything about Winthrop?" Blaze asked. "All she told me was she found him in trouble and helped him. They've been together since. She's taken him to Tails, even Shadow's place," Amy answered. "Well Shadow would have done something if Winthrop wasn't right." Blaze stated. "I don't know, I still don't trust this guy, let alone with Cream." Rouge spoke.

"What should we do," Amy asked. "We need to investigate this very carefully. One of us should keep Cream here in the kitchen while the rest of us try to figure out what's going on," Rouge said.

Who should distract Cream?
1211111211122111111121112111112211112111.title: Suspicion of a Troll

1211111211122111111121112111112211112111.content:
"Amy, you take Cream into the kitchen and no matter what make sure she doesn't leave," Rouge said. Amy put her finger to her chin to think a minute and then said, "Okay, She's probably gonna want to look for a vase or something for her flowers so maybe I can keep her looking for a while."

Amy then went and opened a cabinet and took out a vase. "This is the only empty vase I have left, we should probably put it somewhere where she would never look for a it." They looked around the room until Blaze spoke, "How about the freezer? No one would ever think to find a empty vase in there."

"Good thinking Blaze," Amy complimented as she put the vase into the freezer. As Amy closed it she said, "Okay that's done. But what if Cream hears you two?" Rouge thought for a moment until she spyed a small radio by the window. She picked up and tossed it to Amy as she said, "Just play this and she shouldn't hear us. With looking for the vase and the music playing she won't be non the wiser. But just remember to check in on us after a while. We don't know what might happen and you are our only backup."

"Got it!"

"Okay, lets get back in there before they wonder what we're doing." So they left the kitchen and headed back into the living room where Cream, Cheese, and Winthrop were. As they entered they saw Cream sitting on the couch showing a bored Winthrop the photo album.

Rouge nudged Amy which slightly irritated her until she quickly realized it meant it was time to begin. Amy then cleared her throat and spoke, "Uh, Cream. Shouldn't we find a vase for those flowers?" Cream quickly came to the realization that she forgot about the flowers. "Oh your right Amy. Do you have a vase to keep them in," Cream asked. "I think I have one somewhere in the kitchen. Why don't you and Cheese follow me and we'll look for it," Amy said. "Okay," Cream replied.

Cheese followed Cream as she hopped off the couch and followed Amy into the kitchen, leaving Winthrop alone with Blaze and Rouge, well that and his thoughts. Man that kid can chatter! Geez! Well at least now I can hear myself think! Let see now. I'm in a room with two lovely ladies. One's a purple cat with a not to shabby figure. The other is a bat with a nice body, and wow what's she wearing! Me likely!

Finally alone with the troll how do the two approach Winthrop?
1211111211122111111121112111112211112111.title: Amy

1211111211122111111121112111112211112111.content:
"Lets question him carefully," Rouge whispered to Blaze as she nodded in response. They approached Winthrop on opposite angles. Blaze standing by the glass coffee table on the left, with Rouge moving in on the right. "So... Mr.Winthrop," Rouge asked casually.

Winthrop broke his train of thought and gave his attention to Rouge. "Where might I ask, are you from?" Winthrop's right eye squinted at the question and answered, "I'm kind of a drifter lady. Since my birth I've been moving freely from place to place. Don't really have a place to go or go back too. So to answer your question, I'm from nowheresville."

Rouge gave a frown at that answer for it didn't really give her much info about Winthrop. What should she do?
1211111211122111111121112111112211112111.title: Nonchalant Questioning

1211111211122111111121112111112211112111.content:
Before Rouge could continue with her next question she noticed a small sparkle in Winthrop's pocket. She moved into a get closer look and like a sack a bricks it hit her. It's a Chaos emerald!

Rouge took a step back. "Where did you get that?!" she ordered.

"Get what?" Blaze asked.

"He has a Chaos emerald in his pocket," Rouge answered back.

"What?!" was all Blaze had to say.

Winthrop grinned and jumped off the couch. "So what if I do?"

Rouge and Blaze took battle stances.

"Where did you get it?" Blaze questioned.

"I... borrowed it. From a little two-tailed fox," Winthrop replied with a smug grin.

"And what could you possibly need with it?" Rouge asked.

"How bout I show you?" Who does he use the ring on?
1211111211122111111121112111112211112111.title: Notices the Chaos Emerald

"Now hold on there little lady," Winthrop spoke out. Amy backed off a little but still kept her hammer at the ready. Winthrop knew he had to be careful with this one. From the dialog from before with Sonic and Cream, and with the stories Cream told him on the way over, Winthrop was definitely convinced that this girl was the most feared of the group, therefore the most dangerous. He didn't want to chance firing his ring and possibly missing her, which could lead to end of story, and the end of Winthrop. "Aren't you curious?"

"Cur-Curious about what," Amy replied. "How your friends came to this fate," he answered. "Huh?"

Winthrop just grinned. Perhaps he could find another way around this. From what he also remembered from Creams story's of this female, was that she was more brawn's then brains. Which means she could be easily tricked, and perhaps with the right words... manipulated. Winthrop knew what he was gonna do. This time though he was gonna use his words, not his ring. Yet...

Winthrop then started to stroll around the room with Blaze following from behind as he spoke, "I'm asking if your curious to know how your friends became this," he finished directing to the giant butt, mouth tied bat stuck on the couch, and a "plumper", bikini wearing cat who realizing that everyone's attention was on her again, did a pose showing off her body and smile.

Amy gulped as she was a little nervous to ask almost. "Uh... sure?"

Winthrop smiled as he held out his hand showing off his ring, and took out the chaos emerald which made Amy gasped at the site of it. "With this emerald powering my ring, I can bend anything to my whim. And as you can see, your friends are proper examples."

Amy was confused, and perplexed beyond all belief. Was this really happening? This is the kind of stuff you have in dreams or stories. Not in reality! "Now then...," Winthrop spoke interrupting Amy's thoughts. "What about you?"

Amy pointed at herself in confusion. "What would you like to become," he asked again. This just confused Amy even more. Winthrop just shrugged and picked up a photo as he followed by Blaze walked over to Amy.

"What I'm saying is, what you like to change about yourself?" Amy just took a step back asking, "Why would I want to change myself?"

"Think about it," Winthrop spoke showing Amy the album he was holding. It was a album of Amy, and her friends, the one Cream was showing Winthrop earlier. The album featured their friends like Sonic, Cream and Blaze, and other people Amy knows. But Winthrop was directing her to the females of of the album. "Compared to these other broads, your not really anything special. Your no different from Cream! All you both can offer is a cute face. These other lady's can offer that, and more..."

Amy looked at the picture, then herself, not feeling to good about her body. Winthrop continued, "Now tell me, which kind of girl do you think any these guys in this picture would choose if they had the choice. Let me tell you sister! It wouldn't be you! And now your chances have gotten slimmer, with the modifications I've made to your friends." Winthrop finished directing once again to Rouge, and Blaze who placed her one hand on her hip, and the other behind her head in another pose.

Amy's hammer lowered as she took in what Winthrop was saying. Winthrop then got closer. He moved his head to Amy's ear to whisper, "Do you think you have a chance with that blue hedgehog now, then you ever did? I think not." He then finished and took a few steps back from Amy.

Winthrop's last sentence was still ringing in Amy's head, metaphorically saying. She then took another look at her two friends to see what they become. Rouge was still sitting there trying to remove the energy bind from her mouth, and Blaze was still posing. Everyone stopped what they were doing when Winthrop spoke, "How about a deal?"

Amy then asked nervously, "A... deal?" Winthrop shook his head yes. "Here's the deal, if you promise to let me keep your friends like this, and agree not to tell Cream what I really am. I'll transform you into anything you desire," he finished.

Amy took step back to take what he asked. "What?" She then looked at her friends once again. Rouge was sweating and waving her and shaking indicating she was trying to say, "NO!" Blaze on the other hand ran up to Amy, to say, "Please do it! Please!!!" Rouge and Amy were both taken aback by this.

"I like it like this! Before I was to shy to even look others in the eye! Now... I'm bigger, and don't care who sees!" Blaze finished smacking her butt and making a kissy face. Amy was both weirded out, and awkward at the same time. Blaze stopped to speak again, "Think about it! When Winthrop changes you, Sonic will be drooling all over you!"

Now that made Amy think. If she were to have Blaze's "features", Sonic wouldn't be able to resist her. She knew deep down he had some feelings for her. She just needed something to push him over the edge. This could be it... What was she thinking!? Could she really go through with this!? Knowing that she be endangering Cream, and practically betraying her friends! But... this could be her chance to win over Sonic. She worked hard to maintain her fitness, but she was still developing. And there's also being a late bloomer. Who knows how long before she's fully grown? By then she could miss her chance with Sonic.

"What will you do to Cream," Amy finally asked. "If your worried if I'm using or going to use my ring on her your mistaken. Believe it or not she's kinda grown on me in her own weird way. So you have my word no physical harm will befall her, or your friends," Winthrop answered. But as for mental harm, I can't promise anything. And if Cream provokes me I will use it in a heartbeat. But Cream doesn't seem the violent type. Winthrop thought.

"So what do you say? Do we have a deal?"

She paused and thought abot how she should go out. Personally she would probably exit the window wearing creams PJs but maybe she should consider her hosts feelings just a little more.

123.content:
Cream looked at it with amazement. She picked it up and saw a mark on the side. Given everything that she had learnt from story books she rubbed the side of the lamp. Nothing happened. She sighed and threw the lamp back onto the ground.

"Ow! what did you do that for? I was asleep." A male voice shouted. Cream jumped back. After she had recovered from the shock she asked "Who are you?"
"I'm the genie of the lamp, who are you?" The voice replied.
"My name is Cream. Why didn't you come out when I rubbed the lamp?"
"Do you realise that that trick never works? It's impossible to remove a genie from it's home using friction alone. To summon me, draw a circle with a stra in the middle on the floor, Grab a knife and cut yourself. Then I come out."

Cream jumped back in horror. She began to cry about not wanting to hurt herself.
"O.k. I was joking. Just tip the spout of the Lamp. I'll come pouring out." The Voice said. Cream dryed her tears and picked the lamp up by the handle. She tipped it like a teapot and smoke poured out of the end.

The smoke began to twist and turn. It changed shape until it was the form of a...
123.title: A anitque lamp

1231.content:
The skunk bowed it's head to the young rabbit. He was quite young, just older than Cream. He was wearing a dark green safari shirt and jeans. On his wrists were bandages that wove themselves around his hands. His eyes were dark green.
"Thank you mistress. You wouldn't believe how cramped it is in there. I feel like I haven't stretched for a few decades. I'm Zakaz, by the way." He said, holding his hand out.

"Why did you say, Mistress?" Cream asked after shaking his hand.
"You summoned me, you own me. Unlimited wishes, few boundaries, yadda yadda yadda." Zakaz replied with a yawn.
"But I thought you were only allowed three?"
"Don't believe everything you read in a story book. That three wishes thing is just so we can escape easily."

Cream was having a hard time taking this all in. She had a genie. Her very own genie. She could wish for anything she wanted. Meanwhile, Zakaz had changed the lamp into a watch.
"Here you go. Where this. When you need me, press that silver button. It does tell time as well. Only downside is, if anybody else figures out how to use it, not good."

"Okay. I wish that I had some ice cream and a spoon." Cream said. There was a loud bang and a flash, followed by a slight scent of hazelnuts. She now held a quart of icecream and a spoon. She rubbed her stomach and dug in. Five minutes later she placed the empty pot on the ground.

"I wish for more Icecream!" She said.
"Woah mistress, am I going to be used for just summoning Ice cream?" Zakaz said.
"I guess your right, I wish...

1521.content:
After having been unceremoniously thrown into her prison cell as she was captured by the evil Dr Eggman, Cream got up off of the prison cell's floor as she was now worried and scared.

"What am I going to do? Dr Eggman's already captured me and now someone's gotta save me, but the question is who's gonna save me?" Cream lamented as she was a prisoner of Dr Eggman.

"Your cellmate will save you that's who and I'm gonna bust us out of here." The new friend said as his heroic deep voice rumbled as the new friend then giant stepped over to where Cream was at.

"Who are you? And from the looks of it I'd say you're a fat giant of some sort." Cream said as she looked up at her cellmate who happened to be an gigantic fat anthropomorphic lion.

"Allow me to introduce myself my name is Spunky and you're right I am a gigantic fat anthropomorphic lion for after all no damsel in distress such as yourself should be imprisoned for after all I'm the one person who can save the day." Spunky heroically said as he proudly introduced himself to Cream who happened to be his normal sized cellmate.

"Also you may want to move back as far as possible as I'm about to tear open this cell door." Spunky said as he told Cream to move back as far as possible.

As Cream moved back as far as possible, Spunky got into position as he tore both his and Cream's prison cell door open with his giant fat strength as Cream was immediately impressed.

It was at that moment....

info.brief_description: Cream meets a new friend. Who turns her and her friend lives upside down.
info.description:
While out Cream meets a strange person who has weird abilities that's going to mess with her and her friends lives.

Author:
Creams new friend could be anyone or anything, using any form of powers either magical or sci-fi. He could be a troll or an alien, a genie, they could be good, they could be mean/evil, or anything you can think up. May sound kinda weird but the games have had giant lizards(Sonic Adventure 2), gray aliens (Shadow the Hedgehog), and a flying magical dog (Sonic Unleashed). So I think you readers won't find this to far fetched.

Can have:
Inflation/Expansion
Transformation
Hypnosis/Mind control
Gay/Lesbian (Maybe if only used properly like they were forced and not just because you wrote it saying the character is just gay)
Vore... (Maybe if used properly too)

When adding try and make the characters personality sound right. Like don't have scenes where we find Shadow acting depressed and cutting himself. Or making Knuckles a complete idiot. He's kinda dumb, but not that stupid. Now if they're personality was altered because they were changed by something like magic or hypnosis, that's a different story. So be smart when adding is what I'm saying.

Use good grammar and vocab. So try and make good entries. Also no swearing. I know its 18 and up but try and keep the language down. (Damn, Hell) Something near that is okay.

If you need more info or have questions, don't hesitate to send a message to me.

(All sonic characters are property of SEGA)
